text: Elize Cawood (28 June 1952 â€“ 18 July 2020) was a South African actress. On television, she was known for her role as Pop in Verspeelde lente (1984). Her best known movies were Dis ek, Anna and Red Dust.HAT Taal-en-feitegids, Pearson, Desember 2013, She was born in Bloemfontein, then Union of South Africa."Elegant! Enigmatic! Elize", Get It Online Bloemfontein vom 28 (June 2011). Abgerufen am 26 May 2015.
